channel.title: Question
channel.description:
Sorry this is just a quick question. I know it says that all bids for a sponsered server spot will be reviewed 10 days before the next month begins. Well it's now 5 days before August begins and it still says that my server has yet to be read or reviewed and will be done so within 24-48 hours. I was just wondering if it's just cause you guys are backed up and havn't gotten to mine yet?
The reason for me asking is because i'm about to be really busy and don't want my bid to get reviewed while i'm not around to attend to it.

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It will be reviewed sometime before the 1st when bidding opens.

Read full topic
